entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon then snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 34 this morning. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
